title: Pairing my pc computer to my iPhone
content: I have Firefox installed on my iPhone. I want to sync with my computer. From the computer I turned on the syncing and tried to add another device ( iPhone). A scanning code came up on the computer screen. I went to the iPhone and opened the Firefox browser and went into settings. The camera opened up and I scanned the code in the computer. Then I got a message that said I must pair from within the app. I couldn’t find any place in the app that indicated a pairing function. I’m puzzled by this whole situation because even thou I have no indication that another device was connected to my computer, the bookmarks did appear in the iPhone Firefox browser. What’s taking place ?
creator: geshelin

title: reply to email
content:
jscher2000

Tried to reply to your email. It has not return. Here is a copy of report you requested. It is different from what you sent me.

> Task: invalidateCaches - Unable to invalidate caches > Task: checkCoherence - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: expire - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: originFrecencyStats - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: vacuum - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: stats - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task. > Task: _refreshUI - The task queue was cleared by an error in another task.

I still have no bookmarks. I have restarted the computer a number of times. I also renamed the places.sqlite adding a 1 after places as it said in other directions. I have also refreshed.

Yesterday, I uninstalled Firefox and reinstalled after receipt of your response. It said all cookies, history, bookmarks etc transferred successfully. However, I keep getting the message “ and Bookmarks and history systems will not be functional because one of Firefox’s file is in use by another application. Some security software can cause the problem. I use McAfee, I’ve always used it. I have not changed it.

I did not do anything with favicon file as I don’t know what to do, I understand you can delete that. If there is a list of more than one, then what do I do.

As I indicated, I an NOT a technical person.

Please advise.

Thanks.

[Personal information removed by moderator. Please read Mozilla Support rules and guidelines, thanks.]
creator: izzybizz

title: Dark mode in new opened cards
content: Hello! My wife is disabled by sight. She needs the new opened cards/websites to be ALL in dark mode. I did it successfully on Google website in it own settings....but it should be possible to do once in a Firefox browser settings.......dark theme in Firefox Settings did not help because in new opened cards "frame" and cursor window for text input are black but the rest of the page is white. Thank you, Kris

title: Facebook will NOT respond when I attempt to comment on a posting
content: I recently purchased a new (2021) iMac desktop. I receive notifications that a friend has posted an article on Facebook. I am able to access the Facebook page and read the article. However, I am unable to post a comment. I am also unable to use Facebook Messenger using Firefox. However, I am able to any of the above if I use Chrome or Safari. Why is Firefox the only browser I have trouble with?

title: 2nd firefox windows opened on full screen on 2nd monitor turns off monitor
content:
Im spanish, but i will write in english

This is my setting: 2 monitors from nvidia gt745 in windows 10 (everything up to date). one monitor (the main one) have one firefox window i move a new firefox window to the 2nd monitor, then i start to scroll, and shuddenly monitor shuts.

In the moment i close this 2nd window, monitor turns on.

I have check, uncheck, disable, enable hardware acceleration, performance and so on. It seems to me a bug. Please check it.

title: 1 new message keeps flashing on tab
content:
so i went to a website called imaker.com and when when i switch tabs to another page (like this one) the tab for imaker.com keeps flashing "1 new message" and then the website name and their icon.

how the hell do i stop this from happening as it's extremely distracting.
creator: steveg6

title: Screenshot tool cannot drag and save selected area
content:
I had no problems using the Screenshot tool to save a selected area, until some time ago. I cannot say when it stopped working as expected - perhaps it started with Windows 11, I cannot say.

The (newish) problematic behavior is as follows: the Screenshot tool is invoked, I select an area on the screen, and it immediately gives me the "Shot copied" box at the bottom of the screen, i.e. I do not get the opportunity to manipulate the selected area, or even to DOWNLOAD it rather than COPY it.

If I hold SHIFT before I stop the dragging and then release SHIFT, I get to see the selected rectangle, but it changes size and/or position as I move the mouse around, and cannot be controlled properly.

No change to the above with all extensions disabled.

Thanks for any advice.
creator: bxf999

title: Unable to download and install Firefox
content: I am unable to download and install Firefox on Mac OS despite permitting Firefox download. Not sure what the trouble is.
creator: PD

title: Firefox showing all webpages in French
content:
Hi, 

for some reason Firefox (93.0) 64 bit has suddenly decided to show searched webpages in French. For instance if I search for a product, I get Amazon webpages in French. I live in Canada. I have checked to see if my Firefox Pref.s have changed and I see that I still have English selected as my preferred language. Can you help me?
creator: sfearing

title: Spinning Ball whenever FF or MacOS Updates
content:
Whenever my iMac gets an update from MacOS or FF, it will perform for about a minute or two then I get the freezing and the spinning ball shows up intermittently every 5 seconds. I then have to Reset Firefox and everything performs as normal. This has been going on for about a year now and never seems to clear up. So roughly every month I'm resetting FF so it wan work properly. I am currently on 92.0.1

I also use FF on my MacBook Pro and never have this issue. I have attached raw data - is there anything I can do to remedy this permanently? Thanks!

title: Hlášení o NEZABEZPEČENÉM PŘIPOJENÍ a neplatných certifikátech
content: Dobrý den, prosím o radu. Na starším PC, který mi ještě jede na Windows XP Professional (32bit, AMD Athlon 1,15 GHz a 2,25 GB RAM, používám prohlížeč Mozilla Firefox 48.0.2) se mi od čtvrtečního odpoledne nedaří otevřít některé webové stránky, např. SEZNAM a CENTRUM, a objeví se hlášení o NEZABEZPEČENÉM PŘIPOJENÍ a neplatných certifikátech. Na jiné stránky se dostanu. Je nás asi víc, přikládám ještě zprávičku ze stránek Seznamu a nějakými doporučeními. https://napoveda.seznam.cz/forum/subsections/489 Zkoušel jsem restartovat zmiňovaná zařízení, ale nepomohlo to. Radil jsem se i s podporou Seznam.cz, ale nepodařilo se mi problém nějak vyřešit. Prý je to zapříčiněno aktualizací bezpečnostních certifikátů, které už moje verze prohlížeče a OS nepobere. Na jiném počítači mám normálně Win10, ale na tomto jsem si nechal XP úmyslně, protože mi tam funguje spousta věcí, které by už na Windows 10 asi nechodili. Prý je v případě Win XP třeba stažení a nainstalování nejnovější dostupné verze Firefoxu pro OS, což by údajně měla být 52.9.0 esr. Má verze 48.0.2 prý není podporovaná pro přístup na stránky Seznam.cz. Nedokázal by mi, prosím, někdo poslat instalační soubor na zmiňovanou verzi Firefoxu 52.9.0esr nebo nějak jinak poradit? Děkuji. Roman romsk@centrum.cz
creator: romsk1

title: Firefox problem with Paypal. It shows multiple question marks instead of words at the login and transactions.
content:
Hello, My problem is that every time I go to log in to my PayPal account or work with some settings I get multiple question marks instead of words/letters. (see Screen Shot: https://jmp.sh/EYpj4pJ ) It only happens with the Firefox browser.

I have done what Firefox support recommends for troubleshooting, such as: Turn off extensions, reset preferences, restart, Start Firefox in Safe Mode, delete PayPal cookies, and clear cache. I also tried to disable hardware acceleration but, this doesn't apply to this version because it's not there (see Screen Shot: https://jmp.sh/wEZqkcP) but, the problem continues.

I already talk to PayPal Support because It only happens when using PayPal. They say that this is a Firefox problem since it works fine in other browsers.

I ask: Is there a problem between PayPal and Firefox that I should know about?
creator: info6187

title: How secure is it to sign in to my Firefox account on a device that is not my own?
content: If I sign in to my Firefox account, (like I am signed in now) on a family member's device, how secure is that? Would any of my personal information show or save on that second device? I do not sync, my info is only on my device.

title: Yahoo Mail     Intermittant  'No Internet connection'  message while doing email's

title: Instagram For Desktop Failing To Load Images
content:

The issue is not replicated on either Waterfox, Chrome or Edge so I can only assume that it is a setting within Firefox that is causing the issue which is annoying as Firefox is my default browser !

Any suggestions would be gratefully received.

title: Restoring an older version of Firefox
content:
At one point I installed the newest version of Firefox on my MAC (Early 2008) running Catalina. I found it would not run as that release needs a newer MAC OS.

So I went back and installed Version 78. That did not work either. So I tried Firefox 10.0.11esr.dmg, 10.0.9esr.dmg, and even Firefox.45.9.0esr.dmg.

After install, I get the same message.

You can't use this version of the application Firefox with this version of OS. You have 10.11.6, This application requires 10.12 or later.

My theory is that even though I uninstall Firefox, some trigger file gets left behind and I get this error message no matter what version of Firefox I install.

Anybody have any ideas on how I can run an older version of Firefox?

I have hit the Sept 30 Certification issue with this old MAC and I hope Firefox will be a work around. - Thanks Rod


Same with

title: Bağlanılmadı: Olası Güvenlik Sorunu
content:
Merhaba , yaklaşık geçtiğimiz haftasonundan beri Google arama ve youtube sitelerine girmek istediğimde "Bağlanılmadı: Olası Güvenlik Sorunu" uyarısı ile karşılaşıyorum. Hiç bir şekilde müdehale edemiyorum. Başka browserlerde rahatça açabiliyorum. Ancak yıllardır bir mozilla kullanıcısı olduğumdan siğer browserleri PC'mden hep kaldırıyorum zaten. PC'me format atmıştım ancak bu sorun formattan 3 gün sonra meydana geldi. Bununla alakalı olabilir mi diye bu bilgiyi de sunuyorum size. Android cep telefonumda rahatlıkla kullanabiliyorum. Konu hakkında yardımlarınızı bekliyor ve beni başka browserlere muhtaç etmeyeceğinizi düşünüyorum. Teşekkür eder iyi çalışmalar dilerim.

Saygılarımla.

title: Tato adresa obsahuje číslo portu, které se obvykle používá k jiným účelům než je prohlížení webových stránek. Z bezpečnostních důvodů byl tento požadavek zrušen.
content:
Tato adresa obsahuje číslo portu, které se obvykle používá k jiným účelům než je prohlížení webových stránek. Z bezpečnostních důvodů byl tento požadavek zrušen.

Číslo portu mi tam dává router, kde se přihlašuji na host- internet. Poté nenaběhne stránka na přihlášení a nejde používat hostovský internet. Prosím o radu jak mám toto vyřešit. Mám router Linksys WRT 1900AC a nikde tam není možnost změny. Již jsem zkoušel vše (factory reset atd.). Děkuji. Jan Grmela

title: Perdi mis contraseñas y marcadores al reestablecer Firefox Desktop (a pesar que decia que no los perderia)
content:
Estaba teniendo algunas fallas del navegador al no poder cargar bien el Google Drive ni Gmail, y tenia que quedarme en un pestaña para que cargara si me iba a otra pestaña mientras cargaba no hacia nada

Decidi reinstalar Firefox y al iniciar sesión de nuevo habia perdido todas mis contraseñas, pero podia utilizar el autocompletar campos

Luego desparecieron los marcadores pero podia verlos en la configuración mas no en la barra, decidi restaurar por sugernecia del programa y aunque indicaba que no se perderían datos, igual los perdí junto con el autocompletado

Afortunadamente pude extraer la contraseñas y marcadores a tiempo, porque tambien se perdieron de mi cuenta

Tengos los archivos de respaldo pero no puedo restaurar los marcadores (son bastantes) ni sesiones (son 300)

Agradecido

title: Saved log in
content: Recently (on two machines) Firefox has been showing the 'Update Password' pop-up for saved log ins. If I ignore it all is well, but the password in the box is not the one originally saved. Currently my only option is to cancel the 'update' pop-up every time which is annoying and confusing. I've cleared the cache for several sites to no avail. Any thoughts?
